content: Marion Berry, ex-DC Mayor is considering running for President in 2012... He thinks by the time Pres Obama is done "the country will be ready for me. I already ran Washington for many years." His platform: "Just give ME a 'crack' at it"

content: Yep if we still have a country he'll be just the man to finish it off! "Some people spend an entire lifetime wondering if they made a difference. The Marines dont have that problem." Pres. Reagan, 1985.

content: Why is it that "crack" is acceptable here but S-c-o-o-t-e-r isn't? If Berry runs he should name former Dallas Cowboy Thomas Hollywood Henderson as his VP.
